entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gillam Airport 5:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
